# This collection of vignettes in the wider chillR-context.

PhenoFlex is available via the chillR package []. chillR is a versatile R package with lots of functionalities:

- downloading daily observed weather data from databases like GSOD and DWD
- calculating common agroclimatic variables, such as Chill Portions of the Dynamic Model or Growing Degree Hours from the GDH-model
- routines to access and process latest climate change projections from CMIP6
- statistical analyses on tree phenology via PLS-regression
- forecast tree phenology using PhenoFlex
- and much more
